ItemDesc: When used, increase all allies' ATK by <unbreak>24%</unbreak>, CRIT DMG by <unbreak>20%</unbreak>, and decrease their Ultimate DMG dealt by <unbreak>12%</unbreak> in the next battle.
ItemBGDesc: A classic party treat from Dreamflux Reef. It originated from a nightmare involving pickled cucumbers. It informed everyone with its shocking taste that varied colors don't always equate to varied flavors. They can be sour, very sour, or extremely sour. "We are... red robust pickle! Golden gorgeous pickle! Blue and feeling-blue pickle..." "Friends! Now is the time! Come together to form â€” Florescent resplendent pickle!"
